name: VF 280™
description: VF 280™ is a fast set, rapid curing, pure elastomeric polyurea protective coating for industrial applications requiring a flexible coating or lining for waterproofing or secondary containment. This protective membrane can be applied to geotextile fabric, concrete and steel substrates. VF 280 is a volatile free, odorless system proportioned at a 1:1 mix ratio with plural component spray equipment. VF 280 may be applied at varying thicknesses in a single application using a multi-pass spray technique.
